ctu_text:
The class teacher will collect the admit card for their respective students from CHTs. Further, the admit cards will be given to the respective students and the students may appear in the exam on scheduled date &amp; time. 

**Result:**
SCERT will prepare the result and merit list within a month after the examination is over following the quota of scholarships per district based on their enrollment in 5th class of the Government Schools in H. P.
